author: iarspider
body:
#### PR description:

LLVM reports `use-after-free` error in `SiPixelTemplateDBObjectReader::analyze`: [link](https://cmssdt.cern.ch/SDT/jenkins-artifacts/ib-static-analysis/CMSSW_14_2_X_2024-09-29-0000/el8_amd64_gcc12/llvm-analysis/report-0bb855.html#EndPath)

#### PR validation:

Bot tests
title: [LLVM Analyzer] Avoid storing pointer to a temporary string's internal buffer
